great wiſe creator bleſſed ever legitimate aſtrology exclude himſelf even work incomprehenſible § 2 amongſt infinitely various operation admirably diſcovered conſtitution air ſtrange viciſſitudes definition cannot oppoſe ſaid moiſture § 31 thus reſt planet alſo ♂ ♀ ♃ prove warm ſame reaſon muſt admitted moiſt alſo ſenſe though ptolemy ſee ſcarce mention moiſture effect even ♂ himſelf chapter quoted § 32 proceed planet ſaid dry e cauſer dryth favourer cold much warmth producer moiſture cold muſt reſiſter truth doth reſiſt diſſipating diſcontinuing fatter vapour immiſſion cruder atome § 33 43 met flouds accompanying earthquake ſubterraneous stream iſſuing hiatus convulſive mountain obliged ſpeak thoſe german indian rarity sea may ſucked subterranean well aerial spout river may expelld without proportion rain though sea perhaps may riſe even viſit interiour shore landflouds may increaſe mariner ſay truly ſwells againſt every storm therefore time throughout tempeſt yea thames doth ſeldom believe ſhew u ſuch exuberant tide fall moiſture hath bin ſparing none ſay new ☽ full right theſe aſpects raiſe water impregnation theſe aſpects alſo without ſince flouds always happen thoſe
